name: Food Track Race
description:
Please note, the "pause" menu is just a menu, not really a break time ❕❕❕

Checkpoints

A checkpoint allows the vehicle to reappear ! To activate a checkpoint, roll under it, a sound will be emitted if it all goes well.

Controls

Keyboards

DescriptionAZERTYQWERTYArrow keysMove forward or backwardZSWSup and downMove right or leftQDADleft and rightBrakeSpacebarSpacebarSpacebarRespawnCtrl or RCtrl or RCtrl or RStartEscEscEsc
